entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
